name: MrHuh
description:
Game Description:
3D horizontal board shooting fixed viewing angle.

How it works:
Fireball: Left mouse button
Move: A/D
Jump: W
Suspension: ESC
Toggle Full Screen/Window: F11

Clearance Conditions:
1. Destroy the zombie hut.
2. Destroy the Mutant Chef.

End Conditions:
1. Get too close to monsters.
2. Close the game.

PS: There is only one level, and the progress cannot be saved!
